summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Russell Avenue, from 17th Avenue Northwest to Market Street, by regrading and curbing the same, and constructing concrete walks theroen, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1279 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
